en.mainEmbedTitle: üìú Welcome to the Sol's RNG Communication rules channel!
en.mainEmbedDescription:
**This is where all the rules enforced on our Discord server are listed. Please read and follow them to ensure a pleasant experience for everyone!**

If there is anything confusing, you can go to the channel <#1411590263033561128> to contact the server administrators and ask questions.

**‚ö†Ô∏è Warning Point & Punishment System:**
```
‚Ä¢ 1 Warning Point  = no punishment 
‚Ä¢ 2 Warning Points = 1h Mute
‚Ä¢ 3 Warning Points = 12h Mute
‚Ä¢ 4 warning Points = 1d Mute
‚Ä¢ 5 warning Points = A ban
‚Ä¢ Warning Points expire after 30 days
```
-# Thank you for reading and following! We always strive to develop the most civilized and prosperous Sol's RNG community in Southeast Asia!
en.menuPlaceholder: Select rules you would like to see
en.opt1Desc:
*Flooding/Spamming*
Description: Messages that occupy a large portion of the screen or involve the excessive posting of irrelevant content.
*Exceptions:* Informative messages
(Additional 1 Hour mute)

*Excessive Begging*
Description: Repeatedly asking for favors, items, roles, privileges, or other benefits in an annoying or disruptive manner.
*Exceptions:* Jokingly begging

*XP Farming*
Description: Sending messages solely to gain XP in the Arcane bot and disrupting the chat, while also being unfair to the legitimate users.
(Additional 1 Hour mute)
1st Offense = reminder
2nd Offense = Reduce XP
3rd Offense = Level Reset
en.opt2Desc:
Channel misuses fall under the 1 Warning Rules category, meaning any kind of misuse will result in 1 warning. And possibly a blacklist.

**Chatting Channel Misuse**
Description: Using the chatting channels for purposes other than chatting
Includes: Bot commands outside of the Bots channel.

**Macro Channels Misuse**
Description: using channels in the macro category incorrectly.
*1x Warn:* Reminder
*2x Warn:* 1 Day Macro Channels Blacklist
*3x Warn:* 1 Week Macro Channels Blacklist

**Community Channels Misuse**
Description: Using the channels in the Community section for inappropriate purposes.
*1x Warn:* Reminder
*2x Warn:* 1 Day Misuse Channel Blacklist
*3x Warn:* 1 Week Misuse Channel Blacklist

**Voice Channel Misuse**
Description: Misusing / improperly utilizing the voice channels
(Additional 1h Mute)
en.opt3Desc:
**Inappropriate/Suggestive Language**
Descriptions: Implying/Referencing something inappropriate, offensive, or sexual.
Depending on the severity, this can go up to 3 Warnings or fall into NSFW.

**Toxicity**
Description: Engaging in disruptive behavior that can be seen as disrespectful or toxic in any way.
Exceptions: Harmless arguments, Disagreement about Sol‚Äôs RNG related topic, discussions, constructive criticism, debates, joking with consent

**Advertising/Self Promotion**
Description: Promoting/Spreading one's media for self gain.
Exceptions: With permission
en.opt4Desc:
**Mod Bait**
Description: Sending messages that appear punishable to provoke a reaction, even though they do not violate rules.

**Accusation w/o Evidence**
Description: Making statements or claims about an individual wrongfully and without evidence to put them in a compromised situation
Depending on the severity, this can lead to a ban.

**DM Harassment**
Description: Harassing members via DM's due to having mutual access to the Sol's RNG Communication server

**Discrimination**
Description: Harmful stereotyping based on someone‚Äôs race, gender, sexuality, religion, or any other personal characteristics.
Depending on the severity of the discrimination, extreme/severe cases can fall under ‚ÄúHate Speech.‚Äù
en.opt5Desc:
*Punishment Evading*
Description: Leaving to avoid any punishment of any kind.

*NSFW*
Description: Content that is inappropriate for any professional or public place, usually including nudity or suggestiveness of any kind.

*Hate Speech/Racism*
Description: Any form of imagery / discussions that promotes extreme discrimination and hatred against individuals or groups based on their characteristics

*Child Endangerment*
Description: Any act that puts minors at harm or inappropriate exposure.

*Cybercrimes*
Description: Any form of illegal activity online

*Inappropriate Profile*
Description: Using an inappropriate Discord profile picture, Discord display name, or Roblox username that contains offensive, suggestive, or explicit content.
*Punishments:* Kick. If rejoined and unchanged, Ban
